alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:37PM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Inland Jasper, Beaufort, Coastal Colleton and Coastal Jasper Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light rain will transition to light freezing rain this evening and persist through tonight. This will result in ice accumulation, especially on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper
